entry.title: summer in Kansas
entry.summary:
Author: rednesslover

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,897Chapters: 17/18Kudos: 513

Summary: Something’s off in Gotham—Batman knows. But that’s routine. Until it threatens Damian’s safety.It’s the second time Bruce takes him away from the city. At least this time, he’s driving—not Dick. That meant something: he didn’t want to do this, but had no choice.Still, Damian is furious. Of course he is. He’s not even going to the Titans Tower—his second home, his second family. And it’s all Dick’s fault.He’s angry because he can’t joke with Beast Boy over veggie pizza, or mock BB with Jaime, or suffer through Superboy’s endless talk about fangirls, or meditate with Raven. And Kori… just thinking about her hurts. It’s not his fault, he knows, but it still feels like betrayal.Bruce wants to take him somewhere far—no crime, no pressure, no “Robin.” Just peace. At least until everything settles in Gotham. And this time, he trusts someone to help.What Damian doesn’t know is that Bruce’s mysterious “best friend”—who Damian didn’t even know existed—has a son, too.
